sect1.title: CONST
sect1.para: The CONST keyword specifies that the value passed as a parameter will always be treated as a constant. This is essentially a flag that allows the compiler to properly optimize its code when declaring external functions.
sect1.programlisting: STRING CatStrings(CONST STRING S1, CONST STRING S2) := S1 + S2;
sect1.para: See Also: Functions (Parameters Passing), SERVICE Structure
